features: LIGHT & PORTABLE: With its compact 8.7” screen, slim design and sturdy metal frame, Galaxy Tab A7 Lite is perfectly sized for work on the go
FASTER PERFORMANCE: Comes with fast speed and plenty of storage for multiple users
CONNECTIVITY: WI FI, BLUETOOTH AND LTE: With Wi Fi, Bluetooth and LTE, your team can always be connected and working, no matter where you are
STURDY METAL FRAME: Galaxy Tab A7 Lite features an upgraded metal frame that helps protect against everyday bumps and bangs
MULTI DEVICE EXPERIENCE: Maximize your productivity in new ways with connectivity across your Galaxy devices. A dynamic interface lets you control all your devices at the same time
DUAL SPEAKERS: Dual speakers with Dolby Atmos deliver balanced, high quality stereo sound when in landscape mode

LONG-LASTING BATTERY: The Galaxy Tab A7 Lite features an enhanced battery that will power you through the day and into the evening on a single charge. charge. And the fast charging USB C port gets you back up and working quickly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact Marvel: SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A7 Lite Impresses with Performance and Portability
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A7 Lite for My Mother as a Christmas gift to replace her old tablet, and it's safe to say that this compact tablet is a true marvel. Here's a breakdown of the pros and cons based on my experience:Pros:Compact and Lightweight:The 8.7" form factor of the Galaxy Tab A7 Lite strikes the perfect balance between screen real estate and portability. It's ideal for on-the-go use, easily fitting into bags and providing a comfortable grip for extended usage.Vivid Display:The display quality is impressive, offering vibrant colors and sharp details. Whether you're watching videos, browsing, or reading, the 8.7-inch screen provides an immersive experience, making it a pleasure to consume content.Decent Performance:The tablet's performance is commendable, handling everyday tasks with ease. Apps load quickly, and multitasking is smooth, thanks to the combination of a quad-core processor and 3GB RAM. It's a reliable companion for both work and entertainment.Expandable Storage:The 32GB internal storage is sufficient for basic needs, but the inclusion of a microSD card slot allows for easy expansion, ensuring you have ample space for your growing library of apps, photos, and media.Long Battery Life:The Galaxy Tab A7 Lite excels in the battery department, providing all-day usage on a single charge. Whether you're binge-watching your favorite series or tackling work tasks, the tablet keeps up without constantly needing to be tethered to a charger.Solid Build Quality:Samsung's commitment to quality is evident in the tablet's build. The sturdy construction instills confidence in its durability, making it suitable for both everyday use and travel.Cons:Basic Camera Performance:While the tablet features both front and rear cameras, the image quality is relatively basic. It serves well for video calls and casual photography but falls short of the standards set by dedicated cameras or smartphones.Mono Speaker:The tablet comes equipped with a single speaker, which, while functional, doesn't provide the stereo experience found in some higher-end models. Audiophiles may find the audio output satisfactory but not exceptional.In conclusion, the SAMSUNG Galaxy Tab A7 Lite is a stellar choice for users seeking a compact, budget-friendly tablet without compromising on performance. Its portability, vibrant display, and reliable performance make it a standout in its category. Despite a couple of minor drawbacks, the overall package offers excellent value for the price. Highly recommended for those in search of a versatile and reliable Android tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value for what you pay!
reviews.reviewText: We bought this for our 8 year old for Christmas. He had a 12 year old iPad 2 that quit updating, so he couldn’t play any current games and most just stopped working. Consequently, he didn’t take care of it and broke the screen, so we purchased this tablet before forking out the money for another iPad. I am an apple snob, but I actually really like the tablet. It’s not as aesthetic as an iPad/iphone, but has all the same apps (Minecraft, among us, Roblox,) that kids are obsessed with and the screen is very high resolution. Our child is very pleased with it. It does lag some, but you can expect that paying $100 vs $500+. Overall, great kids tablet, definitely faster than the kindle fires.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed
reviews.reviewText: This is being used as a general-use tablet, not for performance - which is good because it is not a performance tablet! It does everything well enough, and fast enough, but it's not as snappy or zippy as you might think for being a newer Samsung device. Closing down unnecessary tasks and such help a lot.It's a good tablet and worth the value - especially if it's being used for a kid or a senior since it has metal casing and not plastic for drops - but if you need to do anything quickly or with a heavier load - especially graphic games - this one may not be for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I Got this brand new in a sealed box. I've only had it a few days but so far I'm really happy with it. There are a lot of reviews about this tablet being slow. It is a tiny bit slower then my cellphone, but over all the speed is perfectly fine when using my apps and using google search engine. And i havent had any problems with speed when having multiple tabs open. When I first set up tablet when it arrived, downloading the apps onto this device was a slow process. Not unbearably slow but slower then my 800 dollar apple iPad. I got this tablet for $90, so it is expected that it's not going to be as fast and fancy as a more expensive device. But after my tablet was all set up I didn't have any issues with speed that would bother me. I really like it. Keep in mind when buying this you get what you pay for. Compared to just about every tablet out there, this is dirt cheap with only 32gigs of storage. But It's great as a back up device for my purposes. To have just in case my cellphone gets lost or breaks, I dont want to leave my 800 dollar ipad in my hotel room when I go on vacation so this will be a great extra device to bring with me. This is also good for my Kindle, so my books dont take up storage on my cellphone. I've been using it a lot more then i expected and I think it's a really good device. I highly recommend it. Just make sure it meets your needs before buying and you won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good alternative to Fire 8 so far
reviews.reviewText: I just received this tablet which is a replacement for an older Fire 8. The Fire's wifi reception was slow and being stuck with the Amazon environment were the two major reasons for buying this Tab A7lite. (I did get the Google playstore on it.)So far it's been an excellent choice. It's wifi reception is very strong & fast compared to the old Fire. Obviously no hoops to go through to get to the Playstore. It also updated to Android 13 with no problems.The Samsung processor is very quick. Sound is OK, if I need better sound headphones provide it.Waiting to see how the battery performance is. I depleted the battery yesterday to about 20% installing/setting up stuff. So I put it on the enclosed charger. It is NOT a fast charger like my phone.I'll update this review if something significant come up.UPDATE- This tablet is working great. WIFI reception is very good. A nice feature is the ability to limit its charging to 85% thus helping to prolong battery lifespan. At 85% the battery lasts well over a day of web browsing, emails, watching youtube.

reviews.reviewTitle: Little bit slow but still good value
reviews.reviewText: Slow starting up and slow when you click on anything but perfect for our purposes of using it to read library books.

Tengo dos días probando su funcionamiento y la verdad estoy encantado es útil, cómoda y práctica. En cuestión para tareas y actividades de trabajo es una tablet muy útil por el lado de juegos no mucho al menos no con los que requieren una alta demanda diría que juegos simples para pasar el rato son aceptables, a pesar de tener muy poca capacidad con una microsd hace que la tablet sea aún mejor. Su calidad de audio es bastante buena para ser a mí ver de gama media por lo que tampoco se le debe exigir demasiado, en general la recomiendo es un muy bien producto.
